response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its true worth to be around $1,000,000 to you. However, considering the market conditions and the cost involved in production, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product from us at $950,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to meet your needs while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
